TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyPressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks A指定当用户按下某个键时组成的字符。A specifies the character that is composed when the user presses a key. 例如，当用户按下 SHIFT + K、属性返回大写的 k。For example, when the user presses SHIFT + K, the property returns an uppercase K. A事件在用户按下某个键时发生。A event occurs when the user presses a key. 与紧密相关的两个事件事件和。Two events that are closely related to the event are and . 事件之前每事件时用户按下某个键，和一个用户释放某个键时发生事件。The event precedes each event when the user presses a key, and a event occurs when the user releases a key. 当用户按住某个键时，重复和字符重复每次发生的事件。When the user holds down a key, duplicate and events occur each time the character repeats. 一个下达时生成事件。One event is generated upon release. 与每个事件，被传递。With each event, a is passed. A传递与每个和事件。A is passed with each and event. A指定任何修改键 （CTRL、 shift 键或 ALT） 是否已与另一个键一起按下。A specifies whether any modifier keys (CTRL, SHIFT, or ALT) were pressed along with another key. (也可以通过获取此修饰符信息属性类。)(This modifier information can also be obtained through the property of the class.) 设置到`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. 这可防止处理键按键控件。This keeps the control from processing the key press. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件将在处理某些击键。Some controls will process certain key strokes on . 例如，处理 Enter 键之前调用。For example, processes the Enter key before is called. 在这种情况下，您无法取消事件，并且必须取消从键击相反。In such cases, you cannot cancel the event, and must cancel the key stroke from instead. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用如您按下键计数并在每次按键后显示结果。The following example illustrates using the to count keys as they are pressed and to display the results after each key press. 然后设置为 true，以防止操作系统从进一步处理密钥。 is then set to true to keep the operating system from further processing the key. 该示例假定的窗体具有在其上放置。The example assumes a form with a placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 你必须创建此类的新实例。You must create a new instance of this class. 您还必须设置事件处理程序。You must also set the event handler. 你可以构造函数中执行此为您的类。You can do this in the constructor for your class. [!code-cpp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic KeyPressEventArgs Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 当控件中引发指定的事件时，会调用附加的方法和应用程序可以执行代码，以响应事件。When the specified event is raised in the control, the attached method is called and the application can execute code in response to the event.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取修改键的当前状态。Use the property to get the current state of the modifier keys. ## Examples 下面的示例显示一个消息框，显示 SHIFT 键的当前状态。The following example displays a message box that shows the current state of the SHIFT key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

value.span: 如果处理过事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the event is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不处理该事件，则将发送到默认处理操作系统中。If the event is not handled, it will be sent to the operating system for default processing. 设置到`true`取消`KeyPress`事件。Set to `true` to cancel the `KeyPress` event. ## Examples 下面的示例创建控件。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法使用属性检查是否按下 ENTER 键。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key is pressed. 如果按 ENTER 键，属性设置为`true`，表示此事件处理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char KeyChar { char get(); void set(char value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与按下的键对应的字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the character corresponding to the key pressed.
The ASCII character that is composed.

value.span: 例如，如果用户按下 Shift + K，则该属性返回一个大写的 K。

span.span: For example, if the user presses SHIFT + K, this property returns an uppercase K.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性在运行时和修改在运行时的特殊情况下的键击示例击键。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to modify keystrokes under special run-time circumstances. 例如，你可以使用若要在用户输入邮政编码时，请禁用非数字按键，更改按键所有字母都改为在数据输入字段中，大写，或监视键盘或特定组合键其他密钥输入的设备。For example, you can use to disable non-numeric keypresses when the user enters a ZIP code, change all alphabetical keypresses to uppercase in a data entry field, or monitor the keyboard or other key input device for specific key combinations. 你可以获取或设置以下项：You can get or set the following keys: - a 到 z、 A 到 Z。a-z, A-Z. - CTRL。CTRL. - 标点符号。Punctuation marks. - 数字键，同时横跨顶部的键盘和数字键盘上。Number keys, both across the top of the keyboard and on the numeric keypad. - 输入。ENTER. 无法获取或设置以下项：You cannot get or set the following keys: - TAB 键。The TAB key. - INSERT 和 DELETE。INSERT and DELETE. - 主页。HOME. - 结束日期。END. - PAGE UP 和 PAGE down 键。PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN. - F1-F2.F1-F2. - ALT。ALT. - 箭头键。Arrow keys. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何检测到任何上面提到的非字符键的信息，请参阅类。For information about how to detect any of the non-character keys mentioned above, see the class. - ## Examples 下面的示例创建控件。The following example creates a control. `keypressed`方法使用属性检查是否按下 ENTER 键。The `keypressed` method uses the property to check whether the ENTER key pressed. 如果按 ENTER 键，属性设置为`true`，表示此事件处理。If the ENTER key is pressed, the property is set to `true`, which indicates the event is handled. [!code-cpp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyPressEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyPressEventArgs/VB/form1.vb#1)]
